about_the_game:
This is a collection of multiple casual mini-games. A variety of mini-games allow players to experience different fun. All casual mini games are completely free to play.

Save Crabs
Command the crab to find the exit through the command of up, down, left, and right movements.


Stone Maze
By pushing the stone and placing it in a fixed position, the task can be completed.


Electrify
Rotate the linked turntable to connect the disconnected submarine cable and deliver electricity to the endpoint.


More mini games, stay tuned
